title: Super Mario Bros.
description: Guide Mario through the Mushroom Kingdom to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser.

title: Pac-Man
description: Navigate Pac-Man through mazes, avoid ghosts, and eat pellets to earn points.

title: Space Invaders
description: Defend Earth from descending alien invaders in this classic arcade shooter.

title: Donkey Kong
description: Climb ladders, jump barrels, and save Pauline from Donkey Kong’s tower.

title: The Legend of Zelda
description: Embark on a heroic journey to rescue Princess Zelda and defeat Ganon.

title: Metroid
description: Play as Samus Aran exploring alien planets and battling space pirates.

title: Tetris
description: Arrange falling blocks to complete lines and prevent the screen from filling up.

title: Street Fighter II
description: Choose your fighter and battle across the world in classic one-on-one combat.

title: Contra
description: Fight alien forces with powerful weapons and fast-paced side-scrolling action.

title: Mega Man 2
description: Defeat robot masters, steal their powers, and stop Dr. Wily’s evil plans.

title: Castlevania
description: Battle vampires and monsters in Dracula’s castle using your whip and power-ups.

title: Duck Hunt
description: Use the NES Zapper to shoot ducks as they fly across the screen.

title: Punch-Out!!
description: Fight against colorful boxers as Little Mac in this classic boxing challenge.

title: Excitebike
description: Race dirt bikes and build your own tracks in this NES motocross classic.

title: Galaga
description: Shoot alien bugs in waves and rescue your captured ship for double firepower.

title: Double Dragon
description: Two brothers fight their way through gangs to save a kidnapped loved one.

title: Final Fight
description: Clean up the streets of Metro City using raw fists and teamwork.

title: Frogger
description: Guide your frog across roads and rivers to reach safety.

title: Bubble Bobble
description: Trap monsters in bubbles and pop them to clear each level.

title: Dig Dug
description: Dig tunnels and inflate underground monsters to defeat them.

title: Adventure Island
description: Run, jump, and throw axes in a tropical adventure full of danger.

title: Ghosts 'n Goblins
description: Battle undead enemies to rescue the princess in this brutally hard action game.

title: Balloon Fight
description: Fly and pop your opponent’s balloons before they pop yours.

title: Bomberman
description: Strategically place bombs to defeat enemies and destroy walls.

title: Ice Climber
description: Climb icy peaks and break blocks while avoiding falling hazards.

title: Q*bert
description: Jump across cubes to change their color while avoiding enemies.

title: Paperboy
description: Deliver newspapers while avoiding obstacles in this fun cycling challenge.

title: Pole Position
description: Classic Formula One racing game that set the standard for the genre.
Pilot a World War II plane and shoot down enemy aircraft.

title: Xevious
description: Shoot air and ground targets in a scrolling battlefield.

title: BurgerTime
description: As a chef, build burgers while avoiding food-themed enemies.

title: Rampage
description: Destroy buildings and eat people as a giant monster.

title: OutRun
description: Drive a red sports car through scenic routes while racing against time.

title: Golden Axe
description: Battle fantasy enemies using swords and magic in a medieval world.

title: Gauntlet
description: Explore dungeons, fight monsters, and collect treasures cooperatively.

title: Marble Madness
description: Roll a marble through obstacle courses in this physics-based classic.

title: Spy Hunter
description: Drive a high-tech car equipped with weapons to stop enemy agents.

title: Defender
description: Defend humans from alien abductions in a fast-paced horizontal shooter.

title: Prince of Persia
description: Escape the dungeon and rescue the princess using skillful timing and agility.
